I love this game for the cooperative element when playing as a survivor with friends and family. I usually play with at least 2 other friends who I can chat with over Discord or we just play in the same physical room together. Playing as the killer is fun too. The game has made a lot of modifications to wait times for games and upgrades for characters. I must say that I enjoy this game the more I play it.

BDB is like playing tag except for if you are it, you are dead and your teammates are probably dead too because they need you. Or maybe you are it and it is your turn to chase down the group. This is killer tag. 

Most of the time, everyone is having a great time, running around, completing in-game tasks that further your escape or you are "it" and you gotta chase down and slow the group. There are a million ways to customize how you like to play, be it sneaky, tactical or bold as both a survivor ("chasee") or Killer ("chaser,") which you unlock though leveling up your characters. I'm simplifying it, but between the chase there are "Tasks" or mechanics that must be completed by the survivors to end the match and win. If the Killer succeeds in slowing you down and eliminating you and your teammates, the Killer wins. There are rankings too, but I don't understand how they work, and that just keeps changing. I just go with it. 

Just like real-life tag, some play nice and sometimes someone's face go pushed in the dirt (not-so nice.) I don't let it discourage me and move to the next match. It can be a mixed bag. Other times, you have a blast running around, surviving or chasing and having the time of your life. This game is like that. It has its flaws, but in the end, I've had quite a bit of fun along the way, choosing abilities and items that help the game feel more diverse. Will you come across a group of people who try too hard to play what is essentially online tag? Oh yeah. But will you also find the thrill of a perfect plan coming together? Oh yes. Its good fun for all its flaws. Take the good, leave the bad..and run for your lifeeeee~

Wish I could undedicate so much of my life to this game. repetitive, boring, overdone. So tired of the constant ignorance of the developer team. Wish the game mechanics, mmr and cheater problems could finally be taken care of. visuals are the only good thing in this game now. Mr Coat said if the game was getting boring then go play another game so I took the advice... 5 month break and game was still crappy.

良かった点は他の方のレビューに書いてある通りなので悪い点を書きます。
・劣悪なゲームバランス
・サバイバーのマッチング時間の長さ
・民度の悪さ
他にもいろいろありますが特にこの３つが酷いと思います。
　キラーは基本的に一人でも逃がすと煽られます。なので全力で全滅を狙います。しかしスキルレーティングによりどんどん強いサバイバーとマッチングするようになり途中から4人に逃げられ煽られます。そこでサバイバーをやろうとするとマッチングしません。（正確にはマッチング時間が長くゲームをしている時間より待ち時間の方が長く感じます）仕方ないのでキラーをやると上がったスキルレーティングにより当分強いサバイバーとマッチングするのでレーティングが下がるまでボコられ続けます。
　中には「キラーがうまくなれば強いサバイバーにも勝てる！」という意見もありますが強くなる過程で煽られ続けメンタルが先にやられると思います。それでもキラーをプレイするのであれば応援します。もし煽られた時は退出しましょう。ゲームで嫌な思いをする必要はありません。

Well, after years playing the game now i can say.

Its a good game but with BAD DECISIONS.

The purpose of the game is good, the partnership with horror series is nice.
BUT the good point ends here.

Behaviour took a lot of bad decisions with the game.
First: Optimization is bad and always will be.
-Bugs every new update.
-Stupid nerfs
-"Skill-based matchmaking" broken.
-To cover this broken feature they hide the ranks (WOW BEHAVIOUR, VERY NICE DECISION)
-Well, i have not played that much, but every year i play the game to see what's new.
-Here in 2022 i can say the game is now worst than 2021.
-Community is toxic making t-bags if u play bad
-When i said "stupid nerfs", just look to the killer Deathslinger: In september 2021 they have changed "nerfed" this killer.
More terror radius? Ok, fine
0,1 more stunned after survivor break the chain? Ok, fine to me
Now, removing the quick scope? The identity of the killer? OMG BEHAVIOUR
Why i will play as Deathslinger if he does the same thing that Huntress do?
-Oh, almost forgot, the grind feature... OMG, u have to play more than 400 hours if u want all the perks
-And the PERKS are essential to a complete gameplay experience, as survivor or killer.

-Thats it
-New players, stay away from this game u gonna be frustrated
好玩.会人皇步更有意思
They might as well add Darth Vader at this point

This game provides some fun experiences, but it's at the cost of not enjoying the game at times. Cycling of meta perks needs to be implemented, and incentivising killer games needs to be boosted more. Devs need to be cautious of other competition coming in the next year or so because if critical reestablishment of the game structure isn't done then they will lose even more of their playerbase. Game has tanked incessantly since RE chapter, and SBMM introduction. 

This game is a casual game keep it that way.
good

Dieses Spiel macht ansich sehr viel spaß,vorallem der Faktor mit dem Level System,aber der Nachteil ist die Community und der F2P faktor.
Die Community ist viel zu Toxic und als Killer muss man für den Spaß des Survivors spielen ansonsten ist man Toxic,als Killer darf man nicht zum eigenen Spaß spielen und die Survs haben immer recht.
Der F2P Faktor ist auch sehr gering man muss min. Level 50 sein um sich ein neuen Killer/Survivor zu holen.
Und es wäre schon das man wie bei dem Handy game einlog preise bekommt und vielleicht eine 10% Chance hat aus einem Lilanen oder Pinken Geschenken 50 Aurazellen zu bekommen,oder allgemein manchmal welche das man die Chance hat mit F2P auch Lizenzierte Killer/Survivor zu bekommen
